MessageHistory.Text: I've received $231 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.

I need a dead drop:
9x Granddaddy Purple Seed
Working on it. Should be ready in around 4 hours 30 min
We've been working together for a while now, and you've proven to be quite reliable.
If you're needing to order larger quantities of supplies, you can now organize an in-person meeting with me. Just send me a text.
I've received $405 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
The drop is ready. You can find it on the north exterior wall of the arcade
You can pay off your debt by placing cash in my stash. It's behind Dan's Hardware.
Agreed. I'll be in the west construction site for the next 6 hours.
Agreed. I'll be under the west bridge for the next 6 hours.
